prompt: Create a comprehensive Help Center page with a clean, modern design featuring a bright white background. At the top, display a prominent title 'Help Center' in large, bold dark text. Below the title, include a welcoming subtitle explaining the purpose. Add a search functionality with a rounded search bar that has a light gray background, placeholder text 'Search for help...', and a search icon on the right side. Organize the main content into clearly defined sections: 'Frequently Asked Questions' with expandable FAQ items, 'Contact Support' with multiple contact options (email, phone, live chat), and 'Popular Topics' displaying clickable topic cards in a grid layout. Each FAQ item should be contained in a white card with subtle shadows and expand/collapse functionality. The contact support section should display contact methods in horizontal cards with icons. Popular topics should be presented as colorful cards with representative icons and titles. Use consistent padding and spacing throughout, with a color scheme primarily using blues (#2196F3) for primary elements and gray tones for secondary text.
